details.sectionContent: A guest lecture conducted by an expert in CONCRETE TECHNOLOFY

A seminar will be conducted by an expert Prof. QASIMALI BARODAWALA, ITM UNIVERSE. The topics will be related to use of nanotechnology in concrete and construction. A brief knowledge about using nanotechnology in civil engineering will be imparted. The use of CARBON NANOTUBES in construction industry will be emphasized. The concept of Multi-Walled carbon nanotubes will be introduced and effect of Multi-Walled carbon nanotubes on the compressive strength, tensile, flexure strength etc and advancements in concrete technology will be discussed.
Date: 21/02/2018 11:15 PM to 12:30 PM (AERO AUDITORIUM(2ND FLOOR))
